{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = N300 Wireless Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.netgear.com/home/products/wirelessrouters/work-and-play/WNR3500L.aspx |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/WNR3500Lv2 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = Netgear_WNR3500L_v2.0 |wikidevi = Netgear_WNR3500Lv2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = Supported |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = WNR3500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = L |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/05/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Netgear_WNR3500L_v2.0 |wlclass = N300 |series = WNR3500 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY310400153 |icid = 4054A-10400153 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = U12H172T00 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47186B0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1G08U0D; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6JB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A0:21:B7 |oui = A0:21:B7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H172 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Vampik, Tomato (Shibby), Tomato RAF (Victek),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/13/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM: [[Foxconn]] (Hon Hai) U12H172T00/U12H172T99 {{See also|Netgear WNR3500|Netgear PCB ID|Netgear}} FCC photos show the device with a [[Broadcom]] BCM4718A1 WiSoC, BCM4331 : wireless chip, and a W9751G6JB-25 RAM chip. This is completely wrong.
{{Netgear WNR3500 Comparison Chart}}
==Links of Interest== *[http://openlinksys.info/forum/viewthread.php?thread_id=13787 ''Internal photos''] on '''OpenLinksys.info''' *[http://openrouter.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=1435 ''Tomato dla Netgear WNR3500L v2''] on '''OpenLinksys.info''' (PL) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wnr3500l_v2 Techdata: Netgear WNR3500L v2] on OpenWRT
===Firmware=== * DD-WRT [https://dd-wrt.com/support/router-database/?model=WNR3500L_v2 supported] (r28112 and above) :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=1052463#1052463 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum] * OpenWRT trunk isn't supported: [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/netgear-wnr3500l-v2-install-and-bricked/3179/9 kernel 2.6 omit needed NAND flash driver], work [https://forum.openwrt.org/t/nand-flash-driver-for-bcm47xx-wnr3500lv2/7116/54 in progress] * Tomato [http://tomato.groov.pl/download/K26RT-N/build5x-140-MultiWAN/Netgear%20WNR3500Lv2/ supported] * Firmware [https://vampik.ru/post/1/ by Vampik] (Ru), based on the firmware by lly и theMIROn, based on the firmware «by Oleg».
; Debricking * [https://www.myopenrouter.com/article/how-debrick-your-wnr3500lv2-using-windows-and-usb-ttl-cable How to Debrick Your WNR3500Lv2 Using Windows and a USB-TTL Cable]
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=146632 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/forum/thread/30718/3500L-V2/ On '''MyOpenRouter''' forums] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/36525/How-to-Install-Third-Party-Firmware-on-NETGEAR-WNR3500Lv2-With-A-Serial-Cable-on-Linux/ ''How to Install Third Party Firmware on Netgear WNR3500Lv2''] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/34695/Quick-Review-and-Specifications-of-NETGEAR-WNR3500Lv2-Gigabit-Open-Source-Router/ ''Quick Review and Specifications of Netgear WNR3500Lv2''] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/article/36506/How-to-Install-Third-Party-Firmware-on-NETGEAR-WNR3500Lv2/ ''OUI of A0:21:B7 pictured'' in these router screenshots]
===Models=== *[[Netgear WNR3500v1]] • WNR3500 • U12H092T00 (Marvell) *[[Netgear WNR3500v2]] • WNR3500V2 • U12H127T00_NETGEAR *[[Netgear WNR3500v2]](VCNA) • WNR3500V2VC • U12H127T70 *[[Netgear WNR3500U]] • WNR3500U • U12H136T00_NETGEAR *[[Netgear WNR3500Lv1]] • WNR3500L • U12H136T99_NETGEAR *Netgear WNR3500Lv2 • WNR3500LV2 • U12H172T00/U12H172T99
